attributes.action: demand people leave the country if they are unhappy with signs of christian celebration, such as christmas lights in town centres etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some religious faiths are complaning that our towns have christmas lights up during the holiday period because it does not comply with their religion. I believe this is wrong because we are a christian country and it should be outside religions who do not get public shows of celebrations, not christians.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
